description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，副国级党和国家领导人。中国致公党党员，医学博士。曾任安徽省副省长、中华人民共和国卫生部副部长、全国政协副秘书长等职，现任第十四届全国政协副主席、中国致公党中央委员会主席。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, a national deputy leader. Member of the China Zhi Gong Party, Doctor of Medicine. He has served as Vice Governor of Anhui Province, Vice Minister of the Ministry of Health of the People's Republic of China, and Deputy Secretary-General of the CPPCC National Committee. He is currently a Vice Chairman of the 14th National Committee of the CPPCC and Chairman of the Central Committee of the China Zhi Gong Party.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会
en: National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议的全国组织，是中国人民爱国统一战线的组织形式，也是中国共产党领导的多党合作和政治协商的重要机构。
description.en: The national organization of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, it is the organizational form of the Chinese people's patriotic united front and an important institution for multi-party cooperation and political consultation led by the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国主要领导人之一，现任中共中央政治局常委、全国政协主席。
description.en: One of the main leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, currently a member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee and Chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的八个民主党派之一，由归国华侨和侨眷组成。
description.en: One of the eight democratic parties in the People's Republic of China, composed of returned overseas Chinese and their relatives.

nodes.id: 中国致公党中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国致公党中央委员会
en: Central Committee of the China Zhi Gong Party

description.zh-cn: 中国致公党的中央领导机构。
description.en: The central leading body of the China Zhi Gong Party.

description.zh-cn: 安徽医科大学的前身，位于中国安徽省合肥市的医科类高等院校。
description.en: The predecessor of Anhui Medical University, a medical higher education institution located in Hefei, Anhui Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 南京医科大学的前身，位于中国江苏省南京市的医科类高等院校。
description.en: The predecessor of Nanjing Medical University, a medical higher education institution located in Nanjing, Jiangsu Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国安徽省合肥市的医科类高等院校。
description.en: A medical higher education institution located in Hefei, Anhui Province, China.

nodes.id: 纽约州立大学布法罗分校

zh-cn: 纽约州立大学布法罗分校

description.zh-cn: 位于美国纽约州布法罗的公立研究型大学。
description.en: A public research university in Buffalo, New York, United States.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国安徽省的省级国家行政机关。
description.en: The provincial-level state administrative organ of Anhui Province, People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国卫生部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国卫生部
en: Ministry of Health of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 原中华人民共和国国务院主管卫生工作的组成部门，2013年撤销，其职能整合入国家卫生和计划生育委员会。
description.en: The former constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China in charge of health work, which was abolished in 2013, with its functions integrated into the National Health and Family Planning Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国的全国性社区卫生服务行业组织。
description.en: A national industry organization for community health services in China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，汽车工程专家。曾任中国致公党中央委员会主席、科学技术部部长、全国政协副主席等职。
description.en: A Chinese politician and expert in automotive engineering. He has served as Chairman of the Central Committee of the China Zhi Gong Party, Minister of Science and Technology, and Vice Chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物。曾任第十二届全国政协副主席，中国致公党中央委员会主席。
description.en: A Chinese politician. He served as Vice Chairman of the 12th National Committee of the CPPCC and Chairman of the Central Committee of the China Zhi Gong Party.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中国致公党中央委员会常务副主席。
description.en: A Chinese politician, currently serving as the Executive Vice Chairman of the Central Committee of the China Zhi Gong Party.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高领导职务群体，包括在中共中央、全国人大、国务院、全国政协、中央军委等机构担任领导职务的官员。
description.en: The group of top leadership positions in the People's Republic of China, including officials holding leading positions in institutions such as the CPC Central Committee, the National People's Congress, the State Council, the National Committee of the CPPCC, and the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家权力机关。
description.en: The highest organ of state power in the People's Republic of China.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

description.zh-cn: 蒋作君担任中国人民政治协商会议第十四届全国委员会副主席。
description.en: Jiang Zuojun serves as a Vice Chairman of the 14th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

position.zh-cn: 副秘书长, 常务委员

description.zh-cn: 蒋作君曾任第十一届、十二届、十三届全国政协常务委员，并在2007年至2023年间长期担任全国政协副秘书长。
description.en: Jiang Zuojun served as a Standing Committee member of the 11th, 12th, and 13th CPPCC National Committees, and was the Deputy Secretary-General of the CPPCC National Committee from 2007 to 2023.

position.en: Vice Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee

description.zh-cn: 在王沪宁担任全国政协主席期间，蒋作君担任副主席。
description.en: While Wang Huning serves as the Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee, Jiang Zuojun serves as a Vice Chairman.

description.zh-cn: 蒋作君于1993年10月加入中国致公党。
description.en: Jiang Zuojun joined the China Zhi Gong Party in October 1993.

relationships.target: 中国致公党中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 蒋作君自2022年12月起担任中国致公党第十六届中央委员会主席。
description.en: Since December 2022, Jiang Zuojun has served as the Chairman of the 16th Central Committee of the China Zhi Gong Party.

relationships.target: 中国致公党中央委员会

position.zh-cn: 常务委员, 常务副主席
position.en: Standing Committee Member, Executive Vice Chairman

description.zh-cn: 蒋作君曾担任致公党中央常委，并在2012年至2022年间担任常务副主席。
description.en: Jiang Zuojun served as a Standing Committee member of the Central Committee of the China Zhi Gong Party, and was the Executive Vice Chairman from 2012 to 2022.

degree.zh-cn: 医学硕士, 医学博士
degree.en: Master of Medicine, Doctor of Medicine

position.zh-cn: 讲师、副教授、教授、教研室主任、基础医学部主任
position.en: Lecturer, Associate Professor, Professor, Head of Teaching and Research Section, Director of the Department of Basic Medicine

relationships.target: 纽约州立大学布法罗分校

description.zh-cn: 作为高级访问学者在纽约州立大学布法罗分校访学。
description.en: Served as a senior visiting scholar at the University at Buffalo.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国卫生部

description.zh-cn: 蒋作君接替万钢担任中国致公党中央委员会主席。
description.en: Jiang Zuojun succeeded Wan Gang as the Chairman of the Central Committee of the China Zhi Gong Party.

description.zh-cn: 蒋作君接替王钦敏担任中国致公党中央委员会常务副主席。
description.en: Jiang Zuojun succeeded Wang Qinmin as the Executive Vice Chairman of the Central Committee of the China Zhi Gong Party.

description.zh-cn: 张恩迪接替蒋作君担任中国致公党中央委员会常务副主席。
description.en: Zhang Endi succeeded Jiang Zuojun as the Executive Vice Chairman of the Central Committee of the China Zhi Gong Party.

description.zh-cn: 蒋作君于2023年3月当选全国政协副主席，成为副国级党和国家领导人。
description.en: Jiang Zuojun was elected Vice Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee in March 2023, becoming a national deputy-level Party and state leader.

description.zh-cn: 蒋作君是第九届（1998-2003）、第十届（2003-2008）全国人大代表。
description.en: Jiang Zuojun was a deputy to the 9th (1998-2003) and 10th (2003-2008) National People's Congress.
